titleStmt.title: Grace, mercy, and peace conteining 1 Gods reconciliation to man, 2 Mans reconciliation to God. By Henry Denne an unworthy servant of the Church, ...
titleStmt.author: Denne, Henry, 1606 or 7-1660?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the benefit of the city of Rochester,

notesStmt.note: In 2 parts; part 2, "Reconciliation of man to God" begins new pagination.
There are at least 2 editions : one with imprint and pagination as above, the other with "Citie" in imprint and 78 p.
Numerous errors in pagination; pagination deduced from signature collation.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the benefit of the city of Rochester
